abilities.description: When you focus or meditate to @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} about a place, being, or situation (in person or remotely) by puzzling through the logical causes, effects or outcomes, boost.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by researching the circumstances of a concerning situation looking for connections that others may have missed, you may reroll any dice.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.9f538fabf8998c5b]{Compel} using a researched and evidence-based argument, you may roll +wits instead of +heart. If you do, take +2 momentum on a hit.
